name: Bigger Font on Facebook Mobile Site (Medium)
description:
Easy reading with bigger font on Facebook mobile site.

Click here if you prefer large font size

This style is designed to increase font size on Facebook mobile site. Please note that changing font size is complicated because each element is affecting one another. Therefore only the followings are supported:
  • Newsfeed (including text statuses, links, photo and video posts, events, sponsored posts, etc)
  • Liked / Commented / Shared By Friend (including posts and pages)
  • Timeline (including friends, groups and pages)
  • Suggestion (including groups, posts and pages)
  • Single Post (including comments, replies to comments, reactions and shares listing)
  • Hashtag Search (including posts from friends and public posts)
  • Find Friend (including friend requests, search and suggestions)
Hope you like it.
css:
/*
Name : Bigger Font on Facebook Mobile Site (Medium)
Description : Easy reading with bigger font on Facebook mobile site (https://touch.facebook.com)
Link : https://userstyles.org/styles/142335
Author : IDSAM
Updated : 2017-May-08 - initial release
Updated : 2017-May-15 - fixed page suggestion height affected by group suggestion / fixed send message button on updated about section
Updated : 2017-May-29 - fixed buy and sell groups near you
Updated : 2018-Feb-16 - hide annoying native app banner / fixed external link caption / fixed comment and reply section
Updated : 2018-Jun-06 - fixed people you may know
*/

@-moz-document domain("touch.facebook.com") {

  /* HTML Tag */
  @media only screen and (min-device-width: 1920px) { body { width:400px !important; float:right; } }
  body, div { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; outline:0px !important; } /* Container */
  button span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; vertical-align:text-bottom !important; margin-top:0px !important; } /* Button */
  tr, td, th { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Table */
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; max-height:100px !important; } /* Headline */
  input, textarea, label { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Form */
  a { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Anchor */
  p { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; margin-bottom:0px !important; padding-bottom:6px !important; } /* Paragraph */
  header { max-height:200px !important; height:auto !important; font-size:medium !important; } /* Updated External Link @2018-Feb-16 */
  header h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { max-height:100px !important; height:auto !important; white-space:normal !important; } /* External Link Caption */

  /* Specific Case */
  form[action^="/composer/mbasic/?"] div div div span button { border-bottom:1px solid #dddfe2 !important; padding:10px 10px 5px 10px !important; white-space:nowrap; overflow:hidden; } /* Status Type */
  form[action^="/composer/mbasic/?"] div div div span button i { vertical-align:text-bottom !important; } /* Status Type Icon */
  i.feedAudienceIcon { top:0px !important; } /* Audience Icon */
  span img.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Emoji */
  .async_like div div div a div div { overflow:hidden; } /* Photo Post */
  footer div div div div a { font-size:medium !important; font-weight:normal !important; padding:8px 0px 0px 0px !important; margin:0px !important; overflow:hidden; white-space:nowrap; } /* Interaction Button Link */
  footer > div[data-sigil*="mufi-inline"] > div > div { align-items:flex-end !important; } /* Interaction Footer Item Alignment */
  footer > div[data-sigil*="mufi-inline"] > div > div > div > div[id*="actor_selector"] { padding-bottom:0px !important; } /* Interaction Footer Comment As */
  div#root > div[data-sigil*="m-layer-root"] > div > div > div > div > div > ul > li[data-sigil*="touchable"] { padding:0px 8px !important; height:50px !important; } /* Comment As (Item) */
  div#root > div[data-sigil*="m-layer-root"] > div > div > div > div > div > ul > li[data-sigil*="touchable"] > div { align-items:center !important; height:50px !important; display:flex !important; } /* Comment As (Item Content) */
  div#root > div[data-sigil*="m-layer-root"] > div > div > div > div > div > ul > li[data-sigil*="touchable"] > div > div:nth-child(3) > div { padding:0px !important; line-height:0px !important; } /* Comment As (Item Selected) */
  section.touchable div div div { padding-right:8px !important; } /* Fan Page Suggestion */
  section.touchable div div div div span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Fan Page Suggestion Counter */
  div.attachment span div span span { font-size:18px !important; line-height:34px !important; } /* View Full Size (Photo Post) */
  a.touchable div.primarywrap div.content div.preview { max-height:none !important; } /* Messages Preview (Messaging Tab) */
  div.touchable-notification a.touchable div div span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Notification Time (Notification Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div ul li div.touchable a div { line-height:42px !important; height:42px !important; max-width:70%; } /* General Items (Menu Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div ul li div.touchable a div:nth-child(4) { line-height:20px !important; height:20px !important; position:absolute; right:0px; top:11px; } /* General Items Counter (Menu Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div ul li div.touchable a div i.img { margin-top:4px !important; vertical-align:top !important; } /* Create Icon (Menu Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div ul li a.touchable div { line-height:42px !important; } /* See All Items (Menu Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div div div a.touchable div { line-height:42px !important; } /* Help & Settings (Menu Tab) */
  div.mSideMenu div div div a.touchable div i.img { margin-top:4px !important; vertical-align:top !important; } /* Help & Settings Icon (Menu Tab) */
  div#locale-selector div div div span { font-size:medium !important; } /* Default Language (Menu Tab) */
  div.accelerate div div div a.touchable { line-height:50px !important; } /* Popup Box Item */
  div.accelerate div div div a.touchable div { padding-top:0px; } /* Popup Box Item */
  div.accelerate div div div a.touchable span span { white-space:normal; padding-top:7px; } /* Popup Box Item */
  div.accelerate div div div a.touchable span span div { display:inline-block !important; width:100%; vertical-align:middle; padding-top:0px; } /* Popup Box Item */
  div#m_group_stories_container article div div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > div { height:188px; margin-left:2px; margin-bottom:2px; } /* Horizontal Scroll (Group Suggestion) */
  div#m_group_stories_container article div div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > a.touchable > h3 { max-height:42px !important; } /* Horizontal Scroll Title (Group Suggestion) */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > div > div > header + div > div > div.scrollArea-horizontal > div.scrollAreaBody > div[data-sigil*="m-swipe-pymk-item"] > a[data-sigil*="m-swipe-xout"] + div { height:auto !important; } /* Horizontal Scroll (People You May Know #1) */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > div > div > header + div > div > div.scrollArea-horizontal > div.scrollAreaBody > div[data-sigil*="m-swipe-pymk-item"] > div[data-sigil*="undoable-action"] + div { height:auto !important; } /* Horizontal Scroll (People You May Know #2) */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > header + article > div:first-child > div.scrollArea-horizontal[data-sigil*="egoScroller"] > div.scrollAreaBody > div.scrollAreaColumn > div[data-sigil*="hScrollingItem"] > div:first-child > div:nth-child(2) { height:auto !important; } /* Horizontal Scroll (Buy And Sell Groups Near You #1) @2017-May-29 */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > header + article > div:first-child > div.scrollArea-horizontal[data-sigil*="egoScroller"] > div.scrollAreaBody > div.scrollAreaColumn > div[data-sigil*="hScrollingItem"] > div:first-child::after { border-width:0px !important; } /* Horizontal Scroll (Buy And Sell Groups Near You #2) @2017-May-29 */
  div.scrollAreaColumn span span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; top:10px !important; } /* Reaction List */
  div.scrollAreaColumn span span i.img { margin-top:0px !important; } /* Reaction List Icon */
  div.groupChromeView div div div div div div a span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Group View */
  table.publisherBar tbody tr td button.touchable { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Group View Publish Toolbar */
  table.publisherBar tbody tr td button.touchable > i.img { margin-top:2px !important; } /* Group View Publish Toolbar Icon */
  div._mTimelineAppCollection__firstPage div a div div div { max-height:100px; } /* Saved Post Visible Area */
  div._mTimelineAppCollection__firstPage div a div div div div span { max-height:60px; margin-bottom:0px; } /* Saved Post Description */
  div._mTimelineAppCollection__firstPage div a div { align-items:stretch !important; } /* Saved Post Alignment */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] div div div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] div i:first-child { margin:1px !important; } /* Shared Video Post Thumbnail Position */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] div div div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] div i:last-child { margin-top:40px !important; } /* Shared Video Post Play Icon */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] + div > div > div > div > a[href*="/messenger/"]::after { border-width:1px !important; } /* Updated About Section Send Message Button (Only Visible On Desktop) @2017-May-15 */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] + div > div > div > div > a[href*="/messenger/"] > span { line-height:28px !important; margin-top:1px !important; } /* Updated About Section Send Message Text (Only Visible On Desktop) @2017-May-15 */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] + div > div > div > div > a[href*="/messenger/"] > span > span > i.img { vertical-align:text-top !important; } /* Updated About Section Send Message Icon (Only Visible On Desktop) @2017-May-15 */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div.widePic + div > div[data-sigil*="touchable"] > div > div > div > div { position:absolute !important; right:4px !important; bottom:4px !important; } /* Shared Page Video Action Button */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div.widePic + div > div[data-sigil*="touchable"] > div { align-items:flex-end !important; padding:0px 8px !important; } /* Shared Page Video Content Position */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] { margin:8px 0px !important; } /* Shared Page Video Position */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div.widePic { padding:2px !important; } /* Shared Page Video Border */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div.widePic + div > div[data-sigil*="touchable"] > div > div > div::before { border-left-width:0px !important; } /* Shared Page Video Vertical Line */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"]::after { border:1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .1) !important; box-sizing:border-box; content:''; display:block; height:100%; left:0; position:absolute; top:0; width:100%; border-color:#dddfe2; border-radius:4px; box-shadow:0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); } /* Shared Page Video Box Shadow */
  div > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] { position:relative; } /* Paid Video Post Box Position */
  div#root div div div div div div a[href^="/groups/?category"] > span { line-height:42px !important; } /* Discover Group (Top Menu) */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody a.scrollAreaColumn div span { font-size:large !important; line-height:24px !important; } /* Discover Group (Filter Type) */
  div#group-discover-lading-column ul > li { border-bottom:1px solid #dddfe2; padding:10px 0px; } /* Discover Group (Suggestion) */
  div._mGroupDiscover__categoryPage ul > li { border-bottom:1px solid #dddfe2; padding:10px 0px; } /* Discover Group (Filter Suggestion) */
  div[id*="group-discover-card-see-more"] a.primary div.primarywrap div div strong span span { font-size:large !important; line-height:24px !important; } /* Discover Group (See More) */
  div#page div#root div div div header div div div a div > div { height:20px !important; margin-bottom:2px; } /* Discover Page (Top Menu) */
  div[id*="see_all_button"] a > div { line-height:42px !important; } /* Discover Page (See All) */
  div#page div#root div div div div div div a > span { margin-top:0px; } /* Discover Page (Create Page) */
  div.like_thumb_container { padding:0px 4px !important; height:auto !important; } /* Discover Page (Like Thumb) */
  div[data-pymk-loc*="/find-friends/index.php"] div div div div div div a[data-sigil*="m-xout-pymk-suggestions"] > span { line-height:20px !important; } /* Find Friend (People You May Know) */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] > div > i:first-child { margin-top:2px !important; background-size:99% !important; background-position:center top; } /* Shared Video Link Thumbnail Position */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div:first-child > i.img:first-child { margin-top:2px !important; background-size:99% !important; background-position:center top; } /* Photo Post Thumbnail Position */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div:nth-child(3) > div:first-child > a > div > div > i.img:first-child { margin-top:2px !important; background-size:99% !important; background-position:center top; } /* Sponsored Post Thumbnail Position */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div > div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] > div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > div > a > div > div > i.img:first-child { margin-top:2px !important; background-size:99% !important; background-position:center top; } /* Shared Post Thumbnail Position */
  section[data-sigil*="feed-story-share-attachment"] > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) { position:absolute !important; right:-4px !important; bottom:4px !important; } /* Action Button */
  div.sharerAttachmentTitle span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Share Post */
  div#m-future-page-header-title { padding:0px !important; text-align:center !important; } /* Share Post (Header) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > header > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h3 > span > strong + i.img { margin-top:1px !important; } /* Post Header Share Arrow */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > header > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h3 > i.img { margin-top:1px !important; } /* Post Header Location & Feeling Icon */
  div#MPhotoContent > div.voice > div > div > div > div > div > div.msg > a.actor-link + br + div > div#voice_replace_id > span > i.img { margin-top:3px !important; } /* Photo Post Feeling Icon */
  div#modalDialogView form div div span[data-sigil*="share_mode_text"] { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Share Post (Selected Type) */
  div#modalDialog div div div div a[data-sigil*="mflyout-remove-on-click"] span span div > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Share Post (Selection Type) */
  div#modalDialog div div div div a[data-sigil*="mflyout-remove-on-click"] div > i { margin-top:3px !important; } /* Share Post (Selection Icon) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] div section div div div div > div { padding-left:0px !important; padding-right:0px !important; } /* Timeline (Friend Likes Page Suggestion) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] div section div div div > div { padding-right:0px !important; } /* Timeline (Friend Likes Page Suggestion) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > section > section { min-height:60px !important; padding:6px !important; } /* Updated External Link Caption Spacing @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > section > section > div { max-height:80px !important; height:auto !important; white-space:normal !important; } /* Updated External Link Caption @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] > div > section > section > div > div { max-height:80px !important; white-space:normal !important; } /* Updated External Link Caption @2018-Feb-16 */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > div > section > section { min-height:60px !important; padding:6px !important; } /* Shared External Link Caption Spacing @2018-Feb-16 */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > div > section > section > div { max-height:80px !important; height:auto !important; white-space:normal !important; } /* Shared External Link Caption @2018-Feb-16 */
  article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] > div > section > section > div > div { max-height:80px !important; white-space:normal !important; } /* Shared External Link Caption @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments"] > header + div > section > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] + div > div > div[data-sigil*="shareAngoraAttachmentMedia"] + div > header + div > span > span { margin-top:2px !important; } /* Friend Likes Page Review */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] div div div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody > div.scrollAreaColumn { height:auto !important; } /* Timeline (Products Shown) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] div div div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn a div div div div > i.img { margin:0px !important; vertical-align:middle !important; } /* Timeline (Products Shown Avatar) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-feed-story-attachments-element"] div div div div[data-sigil*="feed-ufi-metadata"] footer div > i.img { margin-top:10px !important; } /* Timeline (See Your Memories Icon) */
  div#m_newsfeed_stream > section article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > div { height:188px; margin-left:2px; margin-bottom:2px; } /* Timeline (Group Suggestion) */
  div#m_newsfeed_stream > div > section article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > div { height:188px; margin-left:2px; margin-bottom:2px; } /* Timeline (Group Suggestion) */
  div#m_newsfeed_stream > div > section article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn[data-sigil*="m-swipe-pymk-item"] > div[data-sigil*="undoable-action"] { height:inherit !important; } /* Timeline (People You May Know) @2018-Jun-06 */
  div#m_newsfeed_stream > div#MNewsFeed > section article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.async_fan > div { height:auto !important; } /* Timeline (Page Suggestion) @2017-May-15 */
  div#m_newsfeed_stream > div#MNewsFeed > section article[data-sigil*="story-popup-metadata"] div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > div div div div > div.page_like_thumb > div.inline_block_like_page > div > i.img { vertical-align:middle !important; } /* Timeline (Page Suggestion) */
  div.sharerSelector > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Share Group */
  div#timelineProfileTiles div div div div div div div span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Friend's Timeline (Tiles) */
  div#timelineProfileTiles div div div div div div > i { margin-top:2px !important; } /* Friend's Timeline (See All Icon) */
  div.albums div div.item a div.primarywrap div.content > div { height:50px !important; display:contents !important; } /* Friend's Album */
  div.albums div div.item a div.primarywrap div.right > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Friend's Album (Count) */
  div#root div div div article div div div section div section div span > i { vertical-align:top !important; } /* Friend's Album Permission Icon */
  div#root div div div article div div div section div table.publisherBar tbody tr td button > i { vertical-align:baseline !important; margin-bottom:6px !important; } /* Friend's Album Add Photos Button Icon */
  div#root div div div article div div div section div table.publisherBar tbody tr td button > span { line-height:36px !important; } /* Friend's Album Add Photos Button Text */
  div.async_like[data-sigil*="inline-action-bar"] div div div > a { font-size:medium !important; font-weight:normal !important; padding:8px 0px 0px 0px !important; margin:0px !important; overflow:hidden; white-space:nowrap; } /* Friend's Album Interaction Button Link */
  div.composerClosed form div div div div > textarea[name*="comment_text"] { height:19px !important; } /* Friend's Album Comment Input Box */
  div[data-sigil*="m-photo-composer"] > div:nth-child(2) { padding:0px !important; } /* Comment And Reply @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-photo-composer"] > div.composerClosed > form[action^="/a/comment.php?"] > div { padding:8px !important; } /* Comment And Reply @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-photo-composer"] > div.composerClosed > form[action^="/a/comment.php?"] > div > div > div > div > i.profpic { margin-top:3px !important; } /* Comment And Reply @2018-Feb-16 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-photo-composer"] > div.composerClosed > form[action^="/a/comment.php?"] > div > div > div > button[data-sigil*="composer-submit"] > span { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Comment And Reply @2018-Feb-16 */
  span[data-sigil*="flyout-causal"] { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Page Mention Name */
  div#metabox > div > div > span > div > div[aria-label*="rating"] { top:2px !important; } /* Page Review */
  div#pages_call_to_action a div div > i { margin-top:2px !important; } /* Page Action Icon */
  div#msite-pages-header-contents div div#metabox div div > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Page Category */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Page Tab Link */
  div#root div div div div div div > a[href*="/photos/?tab=album"] > div div div:nth-child(2) span > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; white-space:nowrap !important; overflow:hidden !important; } /* Page Album (Count & Date) */
  div#root div div div div div div > a[href*="/photos/?tab=album"] > div div div:nth-child(2) > div { padding-top:0px !important; max-height:42px !important; overflow:hidden !important; } /* Page Album (Partial Content) */
  div#root div div div div div div div > a[href*="/video_grid/?"] > div div div div > i.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Page Video (All Videos) */
  div#root div div div div div div div div div > a[href*="/video_grid/?"] > div div div div > i.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Page Video (Playlist) */
  div#root div div div div div div div div div > section > div div div div div div div div div > div { height:42px !important; } /* Page Video (Title) */
  div#structured_composer div div.mFuturePageHeader div div div div > button { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; padding:0px !important; text-align:center !important; } /* Write Visitor Post */
  div.timelinePublisher[data-sigil*="write_post_posts_by_others"] div div > div { text-align:center !important; } /* Visitor Post Type Alignment */
  div.timelinePublisher[data-sigil*="write_post_posts_by_others"] div div div > a { display:inline !important; line-height:42px !important; } /* Visitor Post Type Text */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div:first-child div > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Page Featured For You Text */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div:last-child div div a > button { margin:0px 2px !important; width:auto !important; } /* Page Featured For You Button */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div:last-child div div a button > i { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Page Featured For You Button Icon */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div:last-child div:last-child > div:last-child[data-autoid*="autoid"] { position:absolute !important; right:2px !important; bottom:4px !important; height:auto !important; overflow:inherit !important; transform:inherit !important; } /* Page Featured For You Button Position */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div:last-child div:last-child > div:last-child > a[data-autoid*="autoid"] > button[data-sigil*="touchable"] { position:absolute !important; right:2px !important; bottom:2px !important; height:auto !important; overflow:inherit !important; transform:inherit !important; min-height:28px !important; } /* Page Featured For You Review Button Position */
  div.scrollArea-horizontal div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div div div div:last-child[data-autoid*="autoid"] div > div[data-sigil*="inlineVideo"] { overflow:inherit !important; } /* Page Featured For You Video */
  div#root div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div a[data-sigil*="reaction_logging"] > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* See All Text (About & Community) */
  div#root div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div a[data-sigil*="reaction_logging"] > i.img { margin:2px !important; } /* See All Icon (About & Community) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-action"] a[data-sigil*="reaction_logging"] div > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* See All Text (Photos & Videos) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-action"] a[data-sigil*="reaction_logging"] div > i.img { margin:2px !important; } /* See All Icon (Photos & Videos) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div.scrollArea div.scrollAreaBody div.scrollAreaColumn div > section { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; height:auto !important; } /* Videos View */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div.scrollArea > div.scrollAreaBody { margin-left:2px !important; } /* Videos Position */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div div[data-sigil*="m-pages-log-event"] div div div div div div span a > abbr[data-sigil*="timestamp"] { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Reviews (Date) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div div[data-sigil*="m-pages-log-event"] div div div div div div > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Reviews (Interaction #1) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div div[data-sigil*="m-pages-log-event"] div div div div div span > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Reviews (Interaction #2) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div div[data-sigil*="m-pages-log-event"] div div div div div span span span div span.like_def > i.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Reviews (Interaction Icon Like) */
  div#root div div div div div div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] div div div div[data-sigil*="m-pages-log-event"] div div div div div span a[data-sigil*="ufiCommentLink"] > i.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; margin-left:4px !important; } /* Reviews (Interaction Icon Comment) */
  div[data-sigil*="m-add-friend-secondary"] div[data-sigil*="m-add-friend-flyout"] a[data-sigil*="m-add-friend"] button > i.img { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* People You May Know Add Friend Icon @2018-Jun-06 */
  div[data-sigil*="m-add-friend-secondary"] div[data-sigil*="m-add-friend-flyout"] a[data-sigil*="m-add-friend"] button > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:28px !important; } /* People You May Know Add Friend Text @2018-Jun-06 */
  div[data-sigil*="pymk-remove-button"] a[data-sigil*="m-swipe-xout"] button > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:28px !important; } /* People You May Know Remove Text @2018-Jun-06 */
  div#root div div div div > a[href^="/search/"] { padding-bottom:9px !important; font-size:medium !important; } /* Search Filter Type */
  div#root div div div div > a[href^="/search/"] > span { padding:0px 10px !important; } /* Search Filter Type Spacing */
  div#root div > div#BrowseResultsContainer > div#BrowseResultsContainer > a[href^="/graphsearch/"] > div > i.img { margin:0px !important; vertical-align:middle !important; } /* Search Hashtag (See All) */
  div[data-sigil*="search-results"] div div div > a[href^="/search/"] { padding:12px 5px !important; } /* Search Result Type */
  div[data-sigil*="search-results"] div div div.item a.primary div.primarywrap div.image > i.img { margin-top:2px !important; } /* Search Result (Avatar) */
  div[data-sigil*="search-results"] div div div.item a.primary div.primarywrap div.content > div { height:auto !important; } /* Search Result (Title & Subtitle) */
  div[data-sigil*="search-results"] div div div.item > a.right { vertical-align:baseline !important; } /* Search Result (Action Icon) */
  div.mSearchArea div.mSearchTypeahead div.mTypeahead div.jx-typeahead-results > div.jx-result { height:50px !important; } /* Search Preview (Row) */
  div.mSearchArea div.mSearchTypeahead div.mTypeahead div.jx-typeahead-results div.jx-result > a[data-sigil*="typeahead-result"] { padding:5px 0px !important; } /* Search Preview (Item) */
  div.mSearchArea div.mSearchTypeahead div.mTypeahead div.jx-typeahead-results div.jx-result a[data-sigil*="typeahead-result"] > div.profile-icon { margin-top:5px !important; } /* Search Preview (Avatar) */
  div.mSearchArea div.mSearchTypeahead div.mTypeahead div.jx-typeahead-results div.jx-result a[data-sigil*="typeahead-result"] > span { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; } /* Search Preview (Name & Subtext) */
  form[action^="/friends/center/search/"] div div div > table tbody tr td > label > i.img { top:0px !important; } /* Friend Search Icon */
  span[data-sigil*="more"] > a { white-space:nowrap !important; } /* More */

  /* Reaction Icon With Total Count */
  div[data-sigil*="reactions-bling-bar"] > div > span > div[style*="z-index"] > i.img { vertical-align:text-top !important; margin-top:1px !important; } /* 1px @ Timeline */
  a[href^="/ufi/reaction/"] > div > span > div[style*="z-index"] > i.img[role*="presentation"] { vertical-align:text-top !important; margin-top:2px !important; } /* 2px @ Post */
  div[data-sigil*="ufi-inline-comment-actions"] > span > a[data-autoid^="autoid"] > span > i.img { vertical-align:text-top !important; margin-top:0px !important; } /* 0px @ Comment */

  /* Horizontal Scroll Area RSVP Button */
  div.scrollAreaBody > section.scrollAreaColumn { vertical-align:top; }
  div.scrollAreaBody > section.scrollAreaColumn > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) { position:absolute !important; right:-4px !important; bottom:4px !important; }

  /* Horizontal Scroll Area Cross Icon */
  div[data-sigil*="reaction-unit-logging"] > div > div > div.scrollArea-horizontal > div.scrollAreaBody > div.scrollAreaColumn > div > div > div > div > span + div[data-autoid*="autoid"] { position:absolute !important; top:0px !important; background-color:white !important; } /* Page - Featured For You */

  /* Annoying Native App Banner @2018-Feb-16 */
  div#page > div#header-notices { display:none !important; }

  /* Pseudo Element */
  a::after { border-width:0px !important; }
  div::after { border-width:0px !important; }
  div.accelerate div div div::after { border-width:40px 45px 45px 45px !important; }
  div.scrollAreaColumn div div div::after { border-width:0px !important; }
  div.scrollAreaColumn div div div div i.profpic { margin-top:-2px !important; }

  /* CSS Class */
  i.profpic { margin-top:6px !important; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important; box-sizing:border-box !important; } /* Post Avatar */
  button.btn { font-size:medium !important; line-height:20px !important; padding-left:4px !important; padding-right:4px !important; } /* Action Button */

}
